name: Webvizio for AI Coding Agents
tagline: Resolve dev tasks & bugs faster with Webvizio MCP
description: Convert non-technical feedback and bug reports into ready-made code in seconds. Webvizio captures product feedback, automatically gathers all technical data, and helps your team quickly resolve dev tasks using AI coding tools like Cursor or Windsurf.

name: SoWork: The Glow-Up Edition
tagline: All-in-one virtual HQ for high-performing remote teams
description: Since our 2023 launch, SoWork‚Äôs had a massive glow-up: lightning-fast performance, a sleek new UI/UX, fully-featured mobile apps, fun built-in games, and dozens of upgrades based on your feedback. It‚Äôs everything remote work should be. Finally.

name: Rube
tagline: Let your AI actually get things done for you
description: Rube is a universal MCP that enables you to take actions across 600+ applications from within your AI chat, be it Cursor, Claude, VS Code, etc. It manages authentication and tool selection seamlessly and securely within the chat.

name: Trace
tagline: Ultra-fast AI Calendar for people who hate planning
description: Hate planning? Same. That‚Äôs why Trace skips the forms and instantly builds your schedule from a message, voice, or screenshot. Plan without the pain‚Äîno more wasting time on what your calendar should do for you.

name: Roark
tagline: Test, monitor, and improve your voice agents
description: Build voice agents you can trust. Roark tracks call metrics, runs evaluations, and stress-tests your agent with simulated callers across accents, languages, and speaking styles. Failed calls become tests - giving you visibility and continuous improvement.

name: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image
tagline: Meet "nano-bananaüçå" the new SOTA image model
description: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (aka "nano-banana") is Google's new SOTA image model. It excels at character consistency, multi-image fusion, and precise editing with natural language. Available via API, Gemini app and in Google AI Studio.

name: Conductor
tagline: Run a bunch of Claude Codes in parallel
description: Conductor lets you run a bunch of Claude Codes all at once, on your Mac. Each Claude gets an isolated copy of your codebase. See at a glance what they're working on, then review and merge their changes.

name: Tot 2.0
tagline: Your tiny text companion, now mightier
description: Tot 2.0 introduces improved features such as customizable smart bullets, text dividers, automatic indents, seamless iCloud sync, Markdown support, adaptive icons, and iOS automatic backups. Available for Mac, iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

name: Hex Notebook Agent
tagline: Powerful agentic notebook for data analytics
description: Let Hex's agent abstract away the most tedious parts of data work, so you focus on the new, the novel, and the gnarly. Hex brings the best of Claude Sonnet 4 directly to our powerful notebooks where thousands of data teams are already working.

name: NotchFlow
tagline: Pomodoro and music controls in your notch
description: Notchflow transforms your Mac‚Äôs notch into a beautifully crafted productivity hub. Control music, run customizable Pomodoro timers, and take mindful breaks ‚Äî all without leaving your flow.

name: TaskGPT Mobile
tagline: Text your Mac, and tell it what to do
description: Text your Mac, and tell it what to do.

name: CodeX
tagline: Build webapps in minutes for completely free
description: CodeX - Revolutionary AI development platform with 27+ AI models, Designer Mode, Thinking Budget System, and seamless workflow automation. Download free for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

name: Codalogy
tagline: Visualize Any Codebase Instantly
description: Understand any code architecture in minutes. Codalogy analyzes your codebase, breaks it into clear components, and maps functionality & dependencies‚Äîso you can skip the digging and simply explore your code visually, coffee in hand.

name: doola: AI Co-Founder
tagline: The First AI Business-in-a-Box‚Ñ¢ for E-Commerce Entrepreneurs
description: Our AI Co-Founder is the first intelligent partner built for global e-commerce entrepreneurs that cuts back-office work from hours per week to just minutes, so you can focus on building your brand and making sales.

name: Oppla AI IDE
tagline: The AI IDE for Contextual Builders
description: Oppla is the AI IDE for contextual building ‚Äî not just code. Context stays. Context grows. Build without limits.

name: Magic Sandbox
tagline: An AI assistant with an app store
description: On Magic Sandbox, your AI assistant can interact with community-built Magic Sandbox apps to help you get things done. Developers can easily publish and monetize their own AI-powered apps.

name: Higgsfield Records
tagline: Become the Next Global Ai Idol
description: Multi-million contracts already in motion. YOU can become the next global idol with us. It‚Äôs easy. No talent required.

name: WotNow?!
tagline: Perfect your pitch with an AI coach
description: üöÄ WotNow?! ‚Äì Your Neuro-AI Coach for pitching, presenting and learning ‚Äî for individuals and teams. Nail your pitch, own the room and boost performance. Analyzing speech, focus and stress, it gives real-time coaching to keep you calm, confident, productive.

name: TestDino
tagline: Smart playwright test reporting platform
description: TestDino is a Playwright focused reporting and intelligence platform. In one CI step, it classifies failures (bugs, flakies, UI changes) with confidence scores. Git-aware, Slack/PR summaries, screenshots, release metrics. Free month, then simple pricing!

name: CloudFox for Developers
tagline: The AI matchmaker for freelancers & clients with pricing
description: Landing Page For A New Freelancer Marketplace With Lower Fees, Refundable Deposits For Genuine Users, And A Flexible Pricing Model. Optimized For Early Signups Before Product Hunt Launch.
